item.title: Need help, need command for ::message
item.dc:creator: @watch_n_lern watch n lern
item.description:
@watch_n_lern wrote:

[quote=“mrpopyman, post:11, topic:363361”][quote author=watch n lern link=topic=459616.msg3363504#msg3363504 date=1286592666]
EDIT:
add this void:

public void talk(String message) { for (Player p : handler.players) { if ((message.indexOf("tradereq") > 0) || (message.indexOf("duelreq") > 0)) return; if ((p == null) || !p.isActive) continue; client temp = (client) p; if ((temp.absX > 0) && (temp.absY > 0)) if ((temp != null) && !temp.disconnected && p.isActive) temp.sM(message); } }
and if that doesn’t work just add an extra ending bracket. i may have been off 1.
[/quote]

where do i add the void to??[/quote]
anywhere in Client.java.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help, need command for ::message

@watch_n_lern wrote:

EDIT:
add this void:

public void talk(String message) { for (Player p : handler.players) { if ((message.indexOf("tradereq") > 0) || (message.indexOf("duelreq") > 0)) return; if ((p == null) || !p.isActive) continue; client temp = (client) p; if ((temp.absX > 0) && (temp.absY > 0)) if ((temp != null) && !temp.disconnected && p.isActive) temp.sM(message); } }
and if that doesn’t work just add an extra ending bracket. i may have been off 1.

item.title: Need help, need command for ::message
item.dc:creator: @mrpopyman mrpopyman
item.description:
@mrpopyman wrote:

[quote=“watch n lern, post:8, topic:363361”]Message command:

if (command.startsWith("message") && command.length() > 8 && playerRights > 2) { String text = command.substring(8); yell("[SERVER]: " + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1)); }

Yell command:

[code]if (command.startsWith(“yell”) && command.length() > 5 && playerRights >= 0) {
String titles = “” + playerName + “”;

            if (playerRights == 0) {
                titles = "[Player] ";
            }
            if (playerRights == 1) {
                titles = "[Moderator] ";
            }
            if (donator == 1) {
                titles = "[Donator] ";
            }
            if (playerRights == 2) {
                titles = "[Admin] ";
            }
            if (playerRights == 3) {
                titles = "[Co-Owner] ";
            }
    if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Owners Name")) {
                titles = "[Owner]-";
            }
    talk(titles + "" + playerName + ": "
                    + command.substring(5));
    }[/code][/quote]

The “message” command works, the “yell” one makes me come up with some errors

this is what the code is for yell:

[code]if (command.startsWith(“yell”) && command.length() > 5 && playerRights >= 0) {
String titles = “” + playerName + “”;

            if (playerRights == 0) {
                titles = "[Player] ";
            }
            if (playerRights == 1) {
                titles = "[Moderator] ";
            }
            if (donator == 1) {
                titles = "[Donator] ";
            }
            if (playerRights == 2) {
                titles = "[Admin] ";
            }
            if (playerRights == 3) {
                titles = "[Co-Owner] ";
            }
    if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Owners Name")) {
                titles = "[Owner]-";
            }
    talk(titles + "" + playerName + ": "
                    + command.substring(5));
    }[/code]

this is what happens when i compile after adding it:

how do i fix this error?

Read full topic

item.title: Need help, need command for ::message
item.dc:creator: @watch_n_lern watch n lern
item.description:
@watch_n_lern wrote:

Message command:

if (command.startsWith("message") && command.length() > 8 && playerRights > 2) { String text = command.substring(8); yell("[SERVER]: " + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1)); }

Yell command:

[code]if (command.startsWith(“yell”) && command.length() > 5 && playerRights >= 0) {
String titles = “” + playerName + “”;

            if (playerRights == 0) {
                titles = "[Player] ";
            }
            if (playerRights == 1) {
                titles = "[Moderator] ";
            }
            if (donator == 1) {
                titles = "[Donator] ";
            }
            if (playerRights == 2) {
                titles = "[Admin] ";
            }
            if (playerRights == 3) {
                titles = "[Co-Owner] ";
            }
    if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Owners Name")) {
                titles = "[Owner]-";
            }
    talk(titles + "" + playerName + ": "
                    + command.substring(5));
    }[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: Need help, need command for ::message
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

heres ::yell

[code]if (command.startsWith(“yell”) && command.length() > 5 && playerRights >= 0) {
String titles = “”;

            if (playerRights == 1) {
                titles = "[Moderator] ";
            }
            if (playerRights == 11) {
                titles = "[Forum-Mod] ";
            }
            if (playerRights == 2) {
                titles = "[Administrator] ";
            }
            if (playerRights == 3) {
                titles = "[Owner] ";
            }
            if (playerRights == 4) {
                titles = "[Hidden Admin]";
            }
	if (playerRights == 0) {
                titles = "[Player] ";
            }
            talk(titles + "" + playerName + ": "
                    + command.substring(5));
    }[/code]
